name: npm-version-git-flow
description: demo for npm version + git flow

scripts.version: echo 'Build SUCCEEDED' && git flow release finish %s
scripts.postversion: git push && git push --tags && git checkout develop
scripts.prepublish: git checkout master && latesttag=$(git describe --tags) && echo checking out ${latesttag} && git checkout ${latesttag}

author: David Herges <david@spektrakel.de>
